thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Alex Mounsteven

author: Alex Mounsteven
title: Alex Mounsteven
text:
I found a reasonably priced flight - so overall i'm satisfied... my only criticism comes b/c as I tried to drill down and chose the criteria I wanted - so i cld find the exact flight I wanted... however every time I reviewed the particulars of a flight and then went back to the list.... the list wld re-populate with orig/full results... and I had to keep re-chosing my specific criteria (only one layover and only afternoon flights)... I found this very frustrating...
but otherwise I'm satisfied...
